title: Universal Document Converter v6.1.1310.10090 with Key [TorDigger
description:
Universal Document Converter

Universal Document Converter - is the most complete solution for converting documents of any type into Adobe PDF files or image files. Its basis is the technology of virtual printing. Therefore, export the selected format documents Microsoft Word, tables Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint presentations and Autodesk AutoCAD drawings is as simple as typing on a desktop printer.

Advantages of Universal Document Converter:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scalability. The possibility to share Universal Document Converter on a separate computer and use it with a job as a network printer can significantly increase the rate of conversion of documents.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ COM-interface. The presence of COM-interface simplifies the workflow systems with Universal Document Converter.
